attributes.action: Examine (and possibly ban) the use of psychotrophic drugs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Although often given for short term clinical management, psychotrophic drugs have long term effects and have in some instances damaging neurological side effects, especially when given in head injuries, which should be contra - indicated.

Junior medics need better supervision, especially if the UK govt is going to recruit from overseas.  

You can help combat the gung - ho attitude to pharmaceutics by signing below :
